EmailTemplate.name: Mentee Assignment to Mentor Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Copado: Meet your mentee!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
We’ve paired you off with a mentee! Find below your mentee’s details:
Name: {!Mentee__c.User__c}
Email: {!Mentee__c.Email__c}
They are looking forward to chatting with you and will reach out to you within the next few days.
To help you get started, take a look at the Copado Mentorship Playbook that outlines the expectations and responsibilities of both mentor and mentee:
Copado Mentorship Playbook
To request certification vouchers for your mentee, navigate to the My Coupon Requests subtab under the Mentorship menu in the Community and submit your request. Once your coupon request has been approved, you will receive an email with the coupon code that you can provide to your mentee.
